original_title: Lychee grower enjoys fruits of global recognition
article_summary: Agricultural entrepreneur Wu Yuyan, a former media professional, boosts the global profile of Haikou's volcanic lychees through bilingual livestreams and short videos, increasing sales by 50% and inspiring local farmers to embrace online marketing. The initiative, supported by local authorities, showcases the export potential of locally grown produce and faces challenges in accurate translation and steep international shipping costs.</s>
